doc.previous: There are usually multiple reactions proceeding simultaneously in any natural reaction system including those in biology Since any chemical component can participate in several reactions simultaneously the stoichiometric coefficient of the i th component in the k th reaction is defined as
doc.after: so that the total differential change in the amount of the i th component is
